DOC.brief_summary: Study purpose evaluate baseline clinical data , outcome front-line Rituximab contain chemotherapy survival patient grade 3b Follicular Lymphoma . Also histological central review plan order re-assess baseline diagnosis accord new 2016 World Health Organization ( WHO ) criterion .
DOC.brief_title: An Italian Experience Grade 3b Follicular Lymphoma
DOC.criteria: Diagnosis grade 3b Follicular Lymphoma Age > 18 year Frontline treatment Rituximab contain chemotherapy Availability histological sample central review Other lymphoma diagnosis
